AlignmentSet.description: A data entity consisting of genomic intervals aligned to a reference.

data_format.description: Data/file format associated with a data entity.

data_path.description: The path to access a resource, on a network or local filesystem. Can be a path relative to the root of the digital object, a URL, or an absolute path.

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

has_reference.description: Specifies the reference coordinate system used by an omics dataset.

has_sample.description: Biological sample included or described by a given thing.

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

Assay.description: A coordinated set of actions designed to generate data from samples.

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

has_data.description: Data entity included in a given collection.

has_sample.description: Biological sample included or described by a given thing.

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

sample_processing.description:
Codes describing sample processing, preparation or handling steps.
The order of the codes should reflect the order in which the steps were performed.
Should be codes from [MSIO](https://bioregistry.io/registry/msio) or [OBI](https://obofoundry.org/ontology/obi.html)].

Assay.title: Assay

MODO.description: Represents the Multi-Omics Digital Object. It encapsulates omics and other datasets and their metadata.

creation_date.description: The date on which something was created.

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

has_assay.description: An assay that was performed as part of a given thing.

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

last_update_date.description: The date on which the thing was last modified.

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

source_uri.description: The URI from which a resource or dataset was obtained or derived.

ReferenceGenome.description: Reference assembly of a given genome, consisting of a collection of congiguous sequences (contigs).

data_path.description: The path to access a resource, on a network or local filesystem. Can be a path relative to the root of the digital object, a URL, or an absolute path.

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

has_sequence.description: Denotes that a sequence belongs to a collection (e.g. a reference genome).

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

source_uri.description: The URI from which a resource or dataset was obtained or derived.

taxon_id.description: The NCBI taxon code from [ncbitaxon](https://obofoundry.org/ontology/ncbitaxon.html) describing the taxonomic range of a sample.

version.description: A string specifying the release or version of a software or resource.

ReferenceGenome.title: ReferenceGenome

ReferenceSequence.description: A contiguous sequence of DNA part of a reference coordinate system (genome assembly).

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

sequence_md5.description: The pre-computed hash uniquely representing a biological sequence. Calculated as the MD5 of the upper-case sequence excluding all whitespace characters (this is equivalent to SQ:M5 in SAM).

source_uri.description: The URI from which a resource or dataset was obtained or derived.

version.description: A string specifying the release or version of a software or resource.

ReferenceSequence.title: ReferenceSequence

Sample.description: A biological sample used in assays. Examples include a whole organism, tissue or cell line.

cell_type.description:
The cell type of the sample, if applicable.
Should be a cell type code URI from the cell ontology.
See: [https://bioregistry.io/registry/cl](https://bioregistry.io/registry/cl)

collector.description: The organization responsible for collecting a given sample.

description.description: A human-readable description for a thing

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

sex.description: The biological sex of a sample.

source_material.description:
The biological source from which the sample was isolated (tissue, organ).
Should be a code URI from the [UBERON](https://bioregistry.io/registry/uberon) ontology or [fairgenomes biospecimen types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fairgenomes/fairgenomes-semantic-model/refs/tags/v1.2/generated/ontology/fair-genomes-biospecimentypes.ttl).

taxon_id.description: The NCBI taxon code from [ncbitaxon](https://obofoundry.org/ontology/ncbitaxon.html) describing the taxonomic range of a sample.

Sample.title: Sample
